description: This file defines an Angular injectable service 'ApiService' that centralizes HTTP interactions with a backend API. It provides methods for GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE HTTP operations, handles URL construction based on environment configuration, and implements error handling for HTTP errors.

classes.name: ApiService
classes.description: Angular service that provides methods for HTTP requests and error handling.

methods.name: url
methods.description: Constructs full URL for API endpoint, ensuring correct slash formatting.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs HTTP GET request, processes the response, and handles errors.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs HTTP POST request, processes the response, and handles errors.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Performs HTTP PUT request, processes the response, and handles errors.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Performs HTTP DELETE request, processes the response, and handles errors.

methods.name: handleError
methods.description: Handles HTTP errors and returns an observable with an Error.

ctags.name: httpParams
ctags.pattern: /^    const httpParams = params ? new HttpParams({ fromObject: params }) : undefined;$/
